attributes.action: Extend cladding remediation funding to buildings under 11 metres
attributes.additional_details: In 2020 the Government announced a new fund for remediation of Non-ACM cladding for buildings 18m or higher. In 2022 a further scheme for all residential buildings above 11m in England was announced for fixing unsafe cladding, protecting homeowners from these costs.
attributes.background: To ensure equality among homeowners, extend the assistance provided by the Government for remedial cladding works to all homeowners regardless of building height, expanding upon the precedent already set by the Government.
